Posts.EditableText:
You mean the colours in the editor?

I believe this has been raised in the past, but can't remember if there was a solution.

If you're using the web editor, you could probably override the colours using a user stylesheet; although how you go about this varies between browsers.
On the desktop editor, I don't think there is such an option. If you can read XML, there's nothing to stop you editing your game in vim, Notepad++, or any other code editor; but this takes away from Quest's ease-of-use somewhat.

Hope that helps :)
